#summary Notes and hints to contribute to AQuery source.

=Contribution=

AQuery is open sourced and welcome any contribution.

==Github & Pull Request==

The easiest way to contribute is to fork AQuery source at [https://github.com/androidquery/androidquery GitHub] and send us a pull request.

==Pull Request==

There are couple criteria for us to merge a pull request:

  * No Dependency - It must not dependent on any 3rd party library. AQuery is designed to use as a single jar file.
